snippet: This weekend’s races feature AC 45s, a prelude to larger, more customized AC 50s to be used in the finals next year. But they have yet to be built.
abstract: America's Cup crews are preparing for World Series event in New York's Hudson River; will head to Chicago next for race on Lake Michigan.
lead_paragraph: This weekend’s races feature AC 45s, a prelude to larger, more customized AC 50s to be used in the finals next year. But they have yet to be built.

headline.main: Testing on the Water in America’s Cup
